summary.span: 定義值來指定要如何調整資料行的寬度。

span.span: Defines values for specifying how the widths of columns are adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以調整大小，讓它們填滿可用的水平寬度的控制項，或使其顯示的完整內容或指定的儲存格的所有資料格及其資料行。The control can resize its columns to make them fill the available horizontal width of the control or to make them display the full contents of all cells or of specified cells. 與模式中，資料行的慣用寬度取決於調整模式的所有資料行，因此在控制項中的所有可見資料行完全填滿可用顯示區域的水平寬度。With mode, the preferred width of a column is determined by resizing all columns in that mode so that all visible columns in the control exactly fill the horizontal width of the available display area. 與其他模式，慣用的資料行寬度會是該資料行，例如目前顯示的資料列中的資料格子集中顯示來自所有儲存格或子集的資料格最大資料格的值所需的最小寬度。With other modes, the preferred column width is the minimum width required to display the largest cell value from all cells or a subset of cells in that column, such as the subset of cells that are in currently displayed rows. 用於避免對效能帶來負面影響，處理多個資料列的資料時使用資料格的子集來判斷新的寬度。Using a subset of cells to determine the new width is useful to avoid a performance penalty when working with many rows of data. 以內容為基礎的自動調整大小，可防止使用者調整資料行寬度，使用滑鼠。Content-based automatic resizing prevents users from adjusting column widths with the mouse. 使用者重新調整大小會啟用在填滿模式中，不過。User resizing is enabled in fill mode, however. 這個列舉型別由控制項屬性和方法。This enumeration is used by the control property and method. 如需調整大小模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about sizing modes, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需有關資料行填入模式特別的是，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料行填入模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode in particular, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個列舉型別，在主要/詳細資料的案例中，兩個控制項會顯示兩個資料表中的父子式關聯性。The following code example illustrates the use of this enumeration in a master/details scenario where two controls display data from two tables in a parent/child relationship. 在此範例中，主控制項的資料行調整大小模式是 [無]，資料行寬度會以程式設計方式初始化成載入的值。In this example, the column sizing mode for the master control is None and the column widths are programmatically initialized to fit the loaded values. 詳細資料控制項是設定為自動調整大小模式，使資料行就會自動調整時的值變更 （例如，當使用者變更父資料表中的目前資料列）。The details control is set to an automatic sizing mode so that columns will adjust automatically whenever the values change (for example, when the user changes the current row in the parent table). 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 建立主從式表單使用兩個 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Create a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md).
